subject: [Radiance-general] Memory issue ranima
body:
It's part of the strategy for memory sharing.  When everything is
finished, you can cat the persistence file (-P or -PP argument) and
run "kill PID" where PID is replaced by the process ID from the
file.  You don't need to reboot, and the process will die on its own
after 8 hours.  (This is set by the TIMELIM #define in src/rt/
persist.c.)

-Greg
